trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Enid
There were no other sightings in Enid on or around February 1st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsStep out front door facing North at 6:30AM CST, Note bright object traveling West, orange glowing orb, movement erratic. Sky was clear overhead and the stars were clearly visible...observed object for 4 minutes until it disappeared in clouds to the West. Unable to determine altitude. Clouds to the West were displaying "heat" lightening and I would guess approximately 20 miles distant.
Summary: orange glowing orb observed moving in Westerly direction
